website_summaries.verdict: Ankle-high, leather and synthetic boxing shoe available in 4 different colors.
pros: The great majority of people who bought these shoes love them, citing the comfortable fit and support
Very lightweight, with a thin sole that provides good grip and flexibility
Many said the shoes came true to size, so fewer surprise exchanges
cons: A small number of people complained that parts of the shoes broke easily or too soon
Some had issues with sizing and had to exchange to get the right fit

website_summaries.verdict: Move freely on the mat with the help of the unisole unit on the Otomix Stingray. The use of lightweight materials aid in nimble movements, while reinforcements deliver the needed lockdown. Its simple yet functional style is favored by contact sports enthusiasts.
pros: The Otomix Stingray is described as very comfortable to wear for wrestling and other indoor physical activities
The high-top construction impresses a high number of users because of the ankle support it delivers
Many athletes adore how grippy the bottom of this Otomix wrestling shoe is
A myriad of reviewers commend the versatility of the trainer
it was good for wrestling, boxing, MMA, weight training, and more
Numerous owners have stated that the lightweight and flexible nature of the footgear makes it easy for them to move quickly on the mat
A significant number of buyers appreciate that the upper is breathable, so their feet don’t get too hot or sweaty
According to multiple shoppers, this product is reasonably priced
The style of this merchandise is found appealing by a lot of consumers
cons: Several people have cited durability issues, which include frayed shoelaces, unraveled stitchings, and torn eyelets
a minority of wearers did not feel stable because of it
Some individuals are complaining about the tongue scrunching down, causing discomfort on their instep
According to a few folks, the material on this wrestling footgear quickly collects dust

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, fraying material and pulls. I expect a lot more when paying £120 for a pair of training shoes, although this is most likely a one-off as other reviews don't reflect this.
customer_reviews.author: markus258

customer_reviews.title: So mine fit a little snug but overall an awesome product and came fast in the mail
customer_reviews.text: Did a U.S. to U.K. Conversion using a site from google but didn't realise that the women's sizes was listed first lol. So mine fit a little snug but overall an awesome product and came fast in the mail. I'd recommend to anyone looking for powerlifting, mixed martial arts, or just looking for a flat, but lightweight shoe for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother for the gym. He absolutely loves them. I'm really tempted to get a pair myself. Too bad there is no Jay Cutler discount in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as Heck 💪🏻😊
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend these for weight lifting although not recommended for running
customer_reviews.author: PAULA S MCKEE

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to treat myself to these and there much better than I thought so comfy to train in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake? In any case i would not buy these
customer_reviews.text: So i purchased these and what i got looks like a used fake pair. Ill let the pics speak for themselves you tell me if these look like whats shown in the picture. Im returning asap.. The picture looked like nice suede right, and the gray is the same tone in the picture? But these shoes look dirty and worn. The tongue is different, these ugly shoes are definitely not what i intended. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: LV226

customer_reviews.title: Great support.
customer_reviews.text: Great . Very comfortable, makes working out feel a little better . just a bit warm but does not bother me at all, should buy about 1/2 above your regular size maybe even a full 1 up.
customer_reviews.author: Biggbossmac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very comfortable to workout and do my leg workout. I was exited to use them since I haven’t worked out for a 1 year. Fit just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben V Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Stick & Move! Stick & Move!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the high top Everlast shoes I got that were way too thin, I think they might have been women's shoes, and took forever to lace up. These are light and fit well. I'm a 9.5 and I ordered a 9.5. I use them for boxing. The tread is thin, which works great in the gym, but not good if your coach makes you run around the damn building like a dog. So I now use these for non Summer months when we'll be staying indoors. The only reason why I'm giving a 4 star and not 5 is because I wish there was more ankle support. It's rather squishy, but other than that, I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronando

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazingly comfortable and great after you wear them for a while. Initially they look really bad and doesn't seem like a fit but after you wear them for a while it sort of feels much better. This was 2nd time I got this shoes, first time I got it from a local store and this time I got it online. The only thing is that it's too expensive for the quality it offers!
customer_reviews.author: TheWildBoy

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: They really do look great. That is the reason for the four stars. My only problem is with the lacing. The way they come laced is tremendously difficult to loosen on the lower laces. This makes it hard to get the bridge of your foot in them. If I change the style of lacing the string becomes so long that both the bow and the strings are on the floor making a possible trip point.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyrod

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, use these for everyday gym/powerlifting shoes. Used to chuck taylors(size 10) Nike's(size 9-9.5) Van's(9.5), size fits around the middle. Ordered size 10 and they have a little room in the toe area. Would recommend and buy again. Souls are super thin and flat, but that's what we're going for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great lifting shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the hubby, and he is absolutely in LOVE! He is a personal trainer, and these are his first pair of lifting shoes. Love how light they are and entirely comfy all around! He does a lot of heavy lifting, and these are by far the best lifting shoes ever! Fits perfectly and item arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe feels a little big on my feet but I love the open feeling my feet have when I wear them to the gym. This is the only shoe I wear to the gym now. It doesn't matter if I'm riding the bike or lifting weights. I will be buying more of these shoes because I like them so much. Was definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dollar Dollar Bill Y'all

customer_reviews.title: Just like I remember! Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes used to use these when powerlifting while I was younger, got back into the gym recently, so I had to get some again, and they did not disappoint, fit great , good angle support and very light! Great seller also would love to do more business with them and see what else they have to offer and what quality products they carry!
customer_reviews.author: Roman G.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have Flintstone feet so it is hard to find comfortable nice fitting shoes of any kind and this was a pleasant surprise. Shoes are very comfortable and fit just right. My feet swell from medical issues so it is hard to find a good shoe. My feet vary from 10.5US-12US depending of fluid retention so these feel like they will be great for all times and these are 10.5US
customer_reviews.author: George Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Little wide for my feet but they are very comfortable, excellent traction and looks ridiculously good
customer_reviews.text: Little wide for my feet but they are very comfortable, excellent traction and looks ridiculously good. Looking to buy another one in different color. Would have been a cool bonus if they included an extra pair of shoe laces in different color. I ended up buying a red laces to replace the black ones. Now they stand out even more. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super wide fit and stretch too much
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Krav Maga practice and my foot slides around in them even if I’ve laces them up as tight as I can. They are the right size so I wouldn’t be able to size down. Bought some thicker socks to see if that helps but I won’t be able to use them if it doesn’t. Update: they keep stretching even with socks so I cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: rcubed10

customer_reviews.title: Stingray
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this these shoes I've been asked by several people in the gym where did I get them from? I lie and say they were a gift and I don't where they were bought. Can't have people wearing my kicks.
customer_reviews.author: BigFish

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to workout in as I am not a wrestler and they are working out very well. They are surprisingly more comfortable than I expected due to the thin sole and I find myself wearing them more often than I should. They are a bit pricey but I think they are worth it. I will purchase another pair when these expire depending on how long they last as these are the most comfortable weight lifting shoes I’ve ever used. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JW1255

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up after reading the reviews. These shoes are comfortable and are very light weight. I do lots of squats and deadlifts and these work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ward

customer_reviews.title: The size was great and my feet is a little wide
customer_reviews.text: The size was great and my feet is a little wide, but the shoe was a little wider than expected. But on the overall they are really nice and comfortable. I read some issues with the quality, so let see but so far I am more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! Totally in love!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars I would! Fit right on the spot! I barely used them once and they were amazing at the gym with zero discomfort! Definitely getting one of each! Totally recommended! Plus excellent shipping
customer_reviews.author: A. J Marti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best workout shoes I’ve ever tried. So comfortable. Not meant for cardio sessions tho, but great shoes for lifting. Very light and cushioned, yet you feel connected to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: CM3

customer_reviews.title: Boxer approved.
customer_reviews.text: I am a boxer and I teach Boxing. Had to order a size small. But I love them. -1 star because the rubber started to peel off the bottom on the toe but I'm gonna glue it back together. Would def buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja.Clint

customer_reviews.title: Make a statement
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I wear them to the gym and they’re pretty much a fashion statement. Your feet can feel the floor, so they’re great for lifting weights and excellent for using the stair climbing machine. I got them in red. They’re not bright red which is good. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: deborah ann

customer_reviews.title: Seem well made, fit is good
customer_reviews.text: Love them, I have 3 pairs in different colors. Do I need to say more. These are gym sneakers, would not recommend them as fashion footwear. Sizing run true too.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: bam!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: if you have never tried these shoes you need to like walking barefoot not for running or jigging because there is no arch in shoe
customer_reviews.author: jim creswell

customer_reviews.title: wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: this is a great fitting shoe. nice look, and they give good support, especially when doing leg presses. very comfortable to walk in as well
customer_reviews.author: Marvin E.

customer_reviews.title: Never know if these had the stability I am searching for
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted ankle support but after wearing them while sitting in my office I started to get a pain in my arch. Too bad since high tops today just have no ankle support
customer_reviews.author: 69isfine.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weightlifters
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend says these are perfect. He is into bodybuilding and weightlifting big time, and he says they are the best shoes he had ever had for fitness. Comfortable, good grip for weightlifting, fit well.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie sather

customer_reviews.title: ... sizing chart stated shoes where sized tight they fit perfect Im 6’2” 235lbs I was hoping they fit when ...
customer_reviews.text: The amazon sizing chart stated shoes where sized tight they fit perfect Im 6’2” 235lbs I was hoping they fit when I got my arrival was completely satisfied... I’m definitely goi g to order 2 pair more.... 10/10 In my book...!
customer_reviews.author: papa joe

customer_reviews.title: Very true to size
customer_reviews.text: love the look and feel, very light. suprising that they ran a tad large. I'm sure could've gone half size smaller but satisfied overall
customer_reviews.author: Edward Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I use these as my exercise shoes. They give me stability when jumping or doing something aggressive and I have traction to move around plus they are very good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Run smaller
customer_reviews.text: These are more like wrestling shoes run a tab snug still fit size 13wide but form fitting and much less sole great for deads rope not good for squat unless you like squatting sand shoes
customer_reviews.author: ice

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality and makes balancing during heavy lifts easy. Great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Words of advice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a heavyweight bodybuilder, he loves this brand and these shoes. He has several and asked for another pair for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are just awesome. Lightweight comfortable and look good too. I’m glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Nice option.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and not only does he love them, but I do as well. So much in fact that I ordered an exact pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: High quality weightlifting shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a replacement for my old Otomix shoes. I am and have been fully satisfied with this product. I use the shoes exclusively for my weightlifting activities and they are both functional and comfortable. I will purchase another pair when this pair need to replaced.
customer_reviews.author: D L Dean

customer_reviews.title: shoe size
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with otomix brand shoes for the past 25 years very comfortable, good construction& I never had a bad pair, o If otomix shoes this my 6th pair I bought in 25 years. I would recommend them I use them for weightlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are totally badass looking and they are TRUE TO SIZE, and extremely light.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: fits good. I have wide feet and a 10 1/2 fits right which is my tennis shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Harbourne

customer_reviews.title: Happy Receiver
customer_reviews.text: Got these in the yellow for bae! Lol. She wears them to boxing/kickboxing classes. Many compliments. They fit well and are very lightweight. They do get dirty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a couple of days. Fits well, feels good. I will see how durability is.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Otomix are the best. Super comfortable. This shoe lets you really feel the ground under you. Plus they look amazing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Veteran Martial Artists!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for MMA. I've been doing Tiger Shulmann's MMA since I was 11, and have never needed to wear wrestling shoes before. However, I'm now concerned about the bacteria on the mat so I decided to grab a pair. These far exceeded my expectations for support/lightness. I'm able to switch my feet, tap and throw round kicks as easily as if I were barefoot. I highly recommend these for anyone who is serious about MMA at a high level and wants foot protection. They are true to fit in relation to Adidas, so whatever size you are in their wrestling shoes will be exactly the same for Otomix. I hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for calf raises due to the grip
customer_reviews.text: I bough a version of the Otomix shoes (not the stingray) and I noticed that the right footing would slip as I walked or added pressure. The stingray are more durable and fits better
customer_reviews.author: chris0breezi

customer_reviews.title: Stingrays rock!
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of Otomix Stingray for years, it's the only sneaker I will wear. They are so light and comfortable, you forget you have anything on your feet. Hope they never stop making these or I'm done with sneakers and will live in boots for the rest of my days. Wish they'd bring the grey ones back
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Husband only use on legday but has made his deadlifts and squats more secure and keeps good grip on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tsai Fu Ju

customer_reviews.title: Check your order form
customer_reviews.text: I ordered red online but order form shows pink now i have to send back to get red like i wanted in first place. Decided its not worth the hassle so i put them up if someone wants them n ill find another brand to buy from now on. I wear my shoes constantly even in public. They only last 6 months but its because i wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandel Charles bastian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use them for Krav Maga, so far so good. I probably should’ve gotten a half size smaller but I just wear two pairs of socks and no problems at all. All in all a great shoe for wrestling, weightlifting , MMA style of activity, etc. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Great lifting shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, use them for leg days. They offer plenty of support for squats and deadlifts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Myth USB’s s love these, he says he feels like he is walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Kamani Palmer

customer_reviews.title: 5 men's size and was perfect! I loved
customer_reviews.text: I'm woman and I use 8.5 from adidas, I bought 8.5 men's size and was perfect! I loved!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: This is the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bodybuilder with a wrestling background. I've been squatting everyday with these, tested them out dealifting, and general cardio sessions. I will be buying these again. Excellent grip and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Brendin

customer_reviews.title: buy the Otomix Ultimate Trainer shoe instead
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Ultimate trainer gym shoes. these didn't last long, but I use the Ultimate Trainers all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus T. Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes . I will be buying more when these wear out . I wear them to the gym when I squat and deadlift . Very light weight . Worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet get a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first pair I ordered due to the fact that the fit was too exact. The return was easy and quick with no hassle. I reordered a half size bigger then what I normally wear, and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chris womack

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am overall satisfied with them, the fit was slightly small but they are nice shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. Light weight comfortable, and super stylish. I’ve had a different brand of weightlifting shoes but otomix shoes are the best... highly recommend to anyone, you won’t be disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Donawin Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Quality Footwear for Recreational Boxing
customer_reviews.text: Used for boxing. Glove-like fit; soles are thin enough to feel the floor, but durable enough to last for years (grippy rubber). Could be a little higher and tighter around the ankle for support, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Barton Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Quality and looks!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes. I’m thrilled with the quality and the gray goes with a lot. I wear gym shoes a lot (and only one other brand) but now I’ll include Otomix! 💪
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made product. Gave them to my husband for his birthday august 19th and he wore them to workout in the about three times for leg day, then an eye on the shoe broke!!!!!! Not worth the money. If there was zero stars I would give zero stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived exactly as described, and in the correct timeframe! I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived exactly as described, and in the correct timeframe! I'll buy agaiN

customer_reviews.text: arrived exactly as described, and in the correct timeframe! I'll buy again

customer_reviews.title: Workouts just got better !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes fit perfect durable very light n received in timely fashion
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Fits amazing sturdy grip. And not gonna lie at all when I say my big 3 went up at least 20lb. A sturdy grip is key for big numbers. Amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my Otomix shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Otomix shoes. Use these for weight lifting and you can't get closer to the ground than this unless you go barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product not much has changed from 20 yrs ago when I was wearing them
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic weight lifting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great weight lifting shoe fits awesome I even wear them outside of the gym
customer_reviews.author: Christopher I. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Otomix brand is the only athletic type shoe I ware ...
customer_reviews.text: Otomix brand is the only athletic type shoe I ware for multiple reasons and I do not use them for the advertised reasons. The grip to the wide array of surface that I deal with daily is outstanding, the comfort and light weight works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weightlifting shoe I plan on purchasing more than I like to see if you have any leather.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: BEST GYM SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I were surprised how well these shoes supports my workouts in the gym, on a treadmill, or while boxing. Great ankle support, light weighted, and easy to move around in. I will never wear any other type of shoes in the gym again...

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks exactly like it’s shown. Perfect bodybuilder, lifting shoes

customer_reviews.text: I always wish to buy one, this is exactly what I expected.

customer_reviews.title: The fit and feel even I’m working out.
customer_reviews.text: It fits really well and I use it for bodybuilding.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R.

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits, wear it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a pair of these shoes for several years. But decided to go back to them because I always liked the old ones. I ordered the suggested size, in it fits great. A very comfortable shoe that I will probably stick with from this point on.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weight Lifting!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son needed for “dedicated” flat soled deadlift shoes.

customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for grappling Jiujitsu and boxing. You can feel everything beneath your feet but still offers some protection.

customer_reviews.title: I love my lifting shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my lifting shoes! They are complete comfortable and light, as well as bendable at the bottom. Great for lifting!

customer_reviews.text: Great for the gym or other high intensity activities. Not good for long distance walking.

customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a friend for his birthday, who works out religiously wears out a lot of Nike shoes and Adidas . these seem to last longer than Nike and adidas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great ankle support! Very comfortable to wear! Love these and wear them all the time in the gym!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, I wear them all the time in the gym now, it almost feels like I am wearing house shoes because they are so comfortable and the material is of high quality. I will definitely be purchasing another pair of a different color.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for MMA and Jujutsu
customer_reviews.text: Great product for MMA and Jujutsu. Not the best for karate as the feet do stick to the mats, so you can't turn on the ball as effectively. Keep the feet warm on those cold dojo mornings :)

customer_reviews.text: Right shoe is bigger than left and both run very wide. Great comfort but wouldn't buy again

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had eyelets on the lower laces. Fit and feel is good may be a little wide. Pushed 350 pound sled yesterday. Great traction Seem to be made very well!

customer_reviews.title: Stabilization of my feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have worked great so far. They have definitely helped with stabilizing my feet during some heavy lifts. Happy with my purchase this far.

customer_reviews.title: otomix sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great mens 7 and 1/2 fits womans size 9 !

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes for weightlifting!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were on a 20-year-old grandson's Christmas list. He was thrilled to receive them, immediately tried them on, and pronounced them a perfect fit.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice, love the color. Comfortable to work out in

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: Reduce knee pain significantly! Push heavier weight on squats with better balance and form because of the shoes flat contours, support and grip...great for yoga as well! A must have for your workouts!

customer_reviews.title: can't wait for second pair
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Even my wife likes how they look. Far as how they feel during workouts. They are my go to shoe now. Deadlifts, squats etc, perfect shoe for this. I do boxing too and wear them there too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOmeof the best lifting footwear I have every owned. You cannot go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Get the Job Done. Happy Lifting.
customer_reviews.text: My routine consists of lifting 5-6 days a week. I dead lift, bench press, squat, etc. I do not do cardio in these shoes, but I have also not tried to do cardio in these shoes. I bought these specifically for weightlifting. The grip is good, they are light weight, and I feel like they get the job done. They look exactly as advertised. I recommend and would buy again. Happy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Perry
